src_original: tatra kāyakṣatir yad uta lābhahetor lābhanidānam ādhāvanaparidhāvanaṃ dauḥśīlyasamudācaraṇaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 身行惡者，為利養故，馳走來往而犯尸羅。

src_original: cittakṣatir yad uta prārthanā /  lābhināṃ ca brahmacāriṇām antike vyāpādabahulatā /
tgt_original: 心行惡者，悕求利養，若見餘人所得利養及同梵行者，興心損壞。

src_original: evaṃ hi bodhisatvo viṣamaparyeṣṭilābhāpagato bhavati / pe //
tgt_original: 是名菩薩捨離惡求利養。 「云何菩薩捨離非法利養？

src_original: iha bodhisatvo na tulākūṭena na mānakūṭena na visraṃbhaghātikayā na dhūrtatayā lābham upārjayati /
tgt_original: 謂此菩薩不行矯詐，取於利養，不以斗秤而行欺誑，他所委信，終不侵損，不行矯詐。

src_original: evaṃ hi bodhisatvo 'dharmalābhāpagato bhavati / pe /
tgt_original: 是名菩薩捨離非法利養。 「云何菩薩捨離不淨利養？

src_original: ye te lābhā staupikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā dhārmikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā sāṃghikasaṃsṛṣṭā vādattā vānnanujñātā vā /  tān na pratīcchati na svīkaroti /
tgt_original: 謂此菩薩所得利養，若窣堵波、若法、若僧共有之物，或他不與亦不許可，雖得彼物必不受之。

src_original: evaṃ hi bodhisatvo 'pariśuddhalābhāpagato bhavati /
tgt_original: 是名菩薩捨離不淨利養。

src_original: yāval labdhā lābhaṃ na mamāyate /  na dhanāyate /  na saṃnidhiṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 「云何菩薩不耽著利養？ 謂此菩薩得利養時，不攝為己物，不自稱富者，亦無積聚。

src_original: kālānukālaṃ ca śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dadāti /  mātāpitṛmitrāmātyajñātisālohitebhyaḥ kālānukālam ātmanā paribhuṅkte paribhuñjānaś cāraktaḥ paribhuṅkte /
tgt_original: 時時施與沙門、婆羅門等，若施與父母及輔翼左右、親友眷屬，時時自用。

src_original: na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭveryāpatham āracayati /
tgt_original: 「善男子！ 云何善能捨離為利養故矯詐諂曲？ 謂此菩薩不為利養因緣故，身、語、心業而為矯詐。 「云何身不矯詐？ 謂此菩薩若見施主及助施者，不現威儀。

src_original: kathaṃ vākkuhanāṃ na karoti /
tgt_original: 「云何不現威儀？ 謂此菩薩若舉足時，不詐徐步； 若下足時，不前視一尋現思惟相，亦不詐偽不顧直視。 「云何語不矯詐？

src_original: na bodhisatvo lābhahetor lābhanidānaṃ mandabhāṇī mṛdubhāṇī na priyabhāṇī bhavati /  nānuvartanavacanāni niścārayati / pe //
tgt_original: 謂此菩薩不為利養故安徐細語、柔軟愛語及隨順語。

src_original: kathaṃ na cittakuhanāṃ kuroti /
tgt_original: 「云何心不矯詐？

src_original: bodhisatvo dāyakena dānapatinā vā lābhena pravāryamāṇo vā cālpecchatāṃ darśayati /  citte na spṛhām utpādayati /  antardāha eṣa kulaputra yad vācālpecchatā cittena lābhakāmatā /  evaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kuhanalapanalābhāpagato bhavati / pe /
tgt_original: 若有施主及助施者請喚之時，菩薩不為利養語現少欲、心廣貪求、內懷熱惱，是名菩薩不為利養故矯詐諂曲。

src_original: na bodhisatvo dānapatiṃ vā dṛṣṭvā nimittaṃ karoti /  vighāto me cīvareṇa /  vighāto me pātreṇa /  vighāto me glānabhaiṣajyena /  na ca taṃ dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ vā kiṃcit prārthayate /
tgt_original: 「云何善能捨離為利養故而現其相？ 菩薩若見施主及助施者，終不現相自言我之衣、鉢、病緣醫藥，而彼施主及助施者雖不惠施，菩薩終不從彼乞求，是名菩薩善能捨離為利養故而現其相。

src_original: na vācaṃ niścārayati /  evaṃ hi bodhisatvo nimittalābhāpagato bhavati /
tgt_original: 「云何菩薩善能捨離為利養故虛言鼓動？

src_original: yāvan na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ vācaṃ niścārayati /  amukenāmukena vā me dānapatināmukaṃ vastu pratipāditaṃ tasya ca mayāmuka upakāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
tgt_original: 菩薩若見施主及助施者，終不詐言：

src_original: yeṣu ca sthāneṣu nātidūre piṇḍapātagocaro bhavati nātisaṃnikṛṣṭe /
tgt_original: 乞食易得，非遠非近；

src_original: yeṣu pānīyāni bhavanty acchāni śucīni nirmalāny alpāyāsāni mukhaparibhogāni yāni  ca sthānāni vṛkṣasaṃpannāni bhavanti puṣpasaṃpannāni phalasaṃpannāni pattrasaṃpannāny
tgt_original: 多諸林木，花果、枝葉皆悉茂盛； 清淨美水，取不為勞；

src_original: apagataduṣṭaśvāpadāni guhāsaṃpannāni prāgbhārasaṃpannāni sukhaparisarpyakāṇi śāntāny  advitīyāni tādṛśāni sthānāny āśrayet /
tgt_original: 龕室安隱，無有惡獸； 山路幽靜，去住無難——如是之處乃可依止。

src_original: sa teṣu sthāneṣv āśrito yad anena pūrvapaṭhitaṃ bhavati tat tribhī rātrais trirdivasasya
tgt_original: 菩薩依止如是處已，隨先所誦，及以所聞，晝夜三時，恒常修習；

src_original: svādhyāyati nātyuccena svareṇa nātinīcena noddhatair indriyair na bahirgatena cittena
tgt_original: 誦經之聲，不麁不細； 善攝諸根，不令變異； 所受用物，皆悉清淨；

src_original: prasādam upajīvan grantham upadhārayan nimittāny udgṛhṇan middham apakrāman /
tgt_original: 了知諸法，差別之相； 捨離惛沈，思惟教理； 其心不動，亦不外緣。

src_original: saced āraṇyakasya bhikṣo rājā vopasaṃkrāmati rājamātro vānye vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadāḥ /  tena teṣām ādareṇa svāgatakriyā kartavyā /  evaṃ cānena vaktavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 「若有王、王子及剎帝利、婆羅門等至菩薩所，菩薩見已恭敬問訊讚言：

src_original: niṣīda mahārāja yathā prajñaptae āsane /
tgt_original: 『善來，大王！ 如所敷設，請王就坐！

src_original: saced upaviśati dvābhyām apy upaveṣṭavyaṃ /  sacen nopaviśati ubhābhyām api nopaveṣṭavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 』王若坐時，菩薩亦坐； 王若不坐，菩薩亦立。

src_original: tasya te mahārāja lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te bhūpradeśe śīlavanto guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ prativasanti /  annupadrutāś caurabhaṭādibhiḥ //
tgt_original: 『大王善能利益，王之國內多有持戒、福德、多聞、智慧沙門、若婆羅門之所居住，無有盜賊及官人等之所侵欺。

src_original: sacet sthiro bhavati vinītaḥ praśāntendriyaḥ bhavyaś ca bhavati dharmadeśanāyāḥ tato 'sya vicitrā dharmadeśanā upasaṃhartavyā /
tgt_original: 』復觀王等諸根寂然，安隱調伏，菩薩爾時當為演說種種諸法。

src_original: saced vicitrāṃ na priyāyate /  saṃvegānukūlā dharmadeśanā upasaṃhartavyā /
tgt_original: 王若不樂說種種法，菩薩即當隨順說厭離法；

src_original: sacet saṃvegānukūlāṃ na priyāyate udārodārāṇi tathāgatamāhātmyāni upadeṣṭavyāni /
tgt_original: 王若不欲樂聞厭離之法，即應為說如來甚深廣大之法及大威德。

src_original: yo 'yaṃ sarvāvasthāsu satvārthaḥ //  yathā kathitaṃ cāryaratnameghe /  sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalāpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati /  sa sanmārjanopalepanaṃ kurvan sarvasatvānām aprāsādikeryāpathavigamāya /
tgt_original: 菩薩若以香花奉獻如來制多及佛形像，以此迴向，令諸有情離破戒垢，得佛戒香； 菩薩又常灑掃、塗地，持此迴向，令諸有情離惡威儀，修善法式，齊整圓滿；

src_original: prāsādikeryāpathasaṃpade ca pariṇāmayati /  sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 又諸菩薩奉獻花蓋，以此迴向，令諸有情捨離熱惱。

src_original: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
tgt_original: 又彼菩薩入僧伽藍發如是心，令有情等入涅槃城；

src_original: sa niṣkramann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
tgt_original: 出伽藍時，願令有情出生死獄；

src_original: sa pithad evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvānāṃ sarvāpāyadvārāṇi pidadhyāṃ /
tgt_original: 若開房門，願令有情開諸善趣出世智門； 若閉房門，願令有情閉惡趣門。

src_original: sa niṣīdann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayeyaṃ /
tgt_original: 菩薩坐時，願令有情皆得坐於妙菩提樹；

src_original: sarvasatvān eva parinirvāpayeyaṃ /
tgt_original: 右脇臥時，願令有情安住涅槃；
